layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x52
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x52
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x20
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 532x19
          text run at (0,0) width 532: "This paragraph should have a green background because its title attribute ends with \"bar\""
